Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is truly exceptional and worth more than its value to many. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it could significantly enhance your experience or needs. I am offering this opportunity to you for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value I believe it can bring to you. I look forward to hearing your decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
